CVXPY
Minimize
  power(x, 2.0) + x
Subject To
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0 +1 x_1
Subject to
 c1: +1 soc_t_0 -1 x_0 = +1
 c2: +1 soc_t_1 -1 x_0 = -1
 c3: +1 soc_t_2 -2 x_1 = +0
 c4: + [ +1 soc_t_1 * soc_t_1 +1 soc_t_2 * soc_t_2 -1 soc_t_0 * soc_t_0 ] <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 soc_t_1 free
 soc_t_2 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x2
Subject to
 c1: +1 x2 -1 x + [ -1 x * x ] >= +0
Bounds
 x free
 x2 free
End
